抾字的基本解释

抾
qū
驱除；除去。
双手捧。
捕捉。

抾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qū］
［《廣韻》去其切，平之，溪。］
［《廣韻》去刼切，入業，溪。］
［《集韻》丘於切，平魚，溪。］
(1)捕捉。
(2)驱赶。

抾字的康熙字典解释

【卯集中】【手字部】　抾； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页424第09
【集韻】【韻會】?丘於切，音祛。【揚子·方言】抾摸，去也，猶言持去也。一曰捧也。　又【唐韻】去劫切【集韻】乞業切，?音怯。持也，挹也。【揚雄·校獵賦】抾靈蠵。【註】挹取也。又音祛。　又【唐韻】去其切【集韻】丘其切，?音欺。兩手挹也。　又【集韻】訖業切，音劫。亦持也。【後漢·馬融·廣成頌】抾封豨。【註】抾，劫古字通。或作?。

抾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
抾字的起名意思

暂无。

抾
Basic explanation of words
抾
qū
Drive away; remove.
Hold in both hands.
Capture.
抾
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qū］
["Guangyun" go to Qiqie, Pingzhi, Xi. ]
["Guangyun" go to cut, enter the industry, stream. ]
["Jiyun" Qiu Yuqie, Pingyu, Xi. ]
(1) Capture.
(2) Drive away.
抾
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Collection] [Hand Character Department] 　抾; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 424 09
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Qiu Yuqie, the sound is removed. [Yangtze Dialect] Touch and touch, go, still speak, hold to go. One said to hold it.　[Tang Yun] Go to Jieqie [Jiyun] Begging for business,? Sound timid. Hold it, 挹 also. 【Yang Xiong·School Hunting Fu】Lingling. [Note] 挹取 also. The sound is removed again.　 [Tang Yun] Go to Qiqie [Jiyun] Qiu Qiqie,? The sound is bullying. Both hands are also.　 [Ji Yun] The industry is cut, the sound is robbery. Also hold also. 【Later Han·Ma Rong·Guangcheng Song】Fengfeng. [Note] 抾, robbery ancient characters. Or for?.
